findBySQLWithRowCount

public Map<String,Object> findBySQLWithRowCount(String sql,
                                                String[] types,
                                                Object[] values)
                                         throws QueryException
Execute a SELECT query, Using query statement directly without being defined in query mappings. Returned all results includes total result size which find by condition.

Specified by:
findBySQLWithRowCount in interface QueryService
Parameters:
sql - query statement.
types - is matched with input parameters. A type must belong to fields defined java.sql.Types package
values - values to bind to the query
Returns:
results. Never returns null; returns the empty collection if there were no results. The result value includes the query execution result and the total result size. And takes values as QueryService.LIST, QueryService.COUNT
Throws:
QueryException - if there is any problem executing the query

findBySQLWithRowCount

public Map<String,Object> findBySQLWithRowCount(String sql,
                                                String[] types,
                                                Object[] values,
                                                int pageIndex,
                                                int pageSize)
                                         throws QueryException
Execute a SELECT query, Using query statement directly without being defined in query mappings. Returned results includes total result size which find by condition and belong to specified page.

Specified by:
findBySQLWithRowCount in interface QueryService
Parameters:
sql - query statement.
types - is matched with input parameters. A type must belong to fields defined java.sql.Types package
values - values to bind to the query
pageIndex - page number which expected to be displayed (pageIndex > 0)
pageSize - page size which expected to be displayed per page (pageSize > 0)
Returns:
results. The size of result is same as entered page size. The result value includes the query execution result handled by paging and the total result size. And takes values as QueryService.LIST, QueryService.COUNT

                                           int pageIndex)
                                    throws QueryException
Execute a SELECT query, using given queryId which defined in mapping xml files. Returned results includes total result size which find by condition and belong to specified page.

Specified by:
findWithRowCount in interface QueryService
Parameters:
queryId - identifier of query statement to execute
values - values to bind to the query
pageIndex - page number which expected to be displayed (pageIndex > 0)
Returns:
results. The size of result is same as length of result which defined a specified query. The result value includes the query execution result handled by paging and the total result size. And takes values as QueryService.LIST, QueryService.COUNT
Throws:
QueryException - if there is any problem executing the query

                                           Object[] values,
                                           int pageIndex,
                                           int pageSize)
                                    throws QueryException
Execute a SELECT query, using given queryId which defined in mapping xml files. Returned results includes total result size which find by condition and belong to specified page.

Specified by:
findWithRowCount in interface QueryService
Parameters:
queryId - identifier of query statement to execute
values - values to bind to the query
pageIndex - page number which expected to be displayed (pageIndex > 0)
pageSize - page size which expected to be displayed per page (pageSize > 0)
Returns:
results. The size of result is same as entered page size. The result value includes the query execution result handled by paging and the total result size. And takes values as QueryService.LIST, QueryService.COUNT
Throws:
QueryException - if there is any problem executing the query

batchExecutor

protected int[] batchExecutor(String sql,
                              int[] types,
                              List<Object[]> targets)
                       throws QueryException
Entered SQL by using BatchSqlUpdate class, execute Batch handling.

Parameters:
sql - query statement.
types - is matched with input parameters. A type must belong to fields defined java.sql.Types package.
targets - object of class which is matched with specified table in XML files. is the List type of Object Array.
Returns:
an array of the number of rows affected by each statement.
Throws:
QueryException

batchDynamicExecutor

protected int[] batchDynamicExecutor(String sql,
                                     List<?> targets)
By calling for batchUpdate method of Spring JdbcTemplate regarding Dynamic SQL, process Update and Delete as Batch. ( In the case instance list of mapped class in a specific table is entered and relevant SQL isDynamic is true )

Parameters:
sql - dynamic query statement.
targets - object of class which is matched with specified table in XML files. is the List type of Object Array.
Returns:
an array of the number of rows affected by each statement

batchStaticExecutor

protected int[] batchStaticExecutor(String sql,
                                    List<?> targets)
By calling for batchUpdate method of Spring JdbcTemplate regarding ordinary SQL, process Insert, Update and Delete as Batch. (relevant SQL isDynamic is false)

Parameters:
sql - static query statement.
targets - object of class which is matched with specified table in XML files. is the List type of Object Array.
Returns:
an array of the number of rows affected by each statement

sqlCUDExecutor

protected int sqlCUDExecutor(QueryInfo queryInfo,
                             Object[] values)
After finding and setting SQL Type of Variable based on query mapping information serving as a specific query I.D., execute query statement by calling for sqlCUDExecutor method.

Parameters:
queryInfo - Query mapping information serving as a specific queryId.
values - a set of variable for executing query
Returns:
the number of rows affected

sqlCUDExecutor

protected int sqlCUDExecutor(String sql,
                             Object[] values,
                             int[] types,
                             boolean isDynamic,
                             String lobStatement,
                             String[] lobParamTypes,
                             String queryId)
Complete and execute query statement to be executed based on query mapping information serving as a specific queryId.

Parameters:
sql - query statement.
values - a set of variable for executing query
types - an array of the SQL Type
isDynamic - whether dynamic query statement
lobStatement - lob statement (update for Handling Lob of Oracle 8i)
queryId - identifier of query statement to execute
Returns:
the number of rows affected
Throws:
QueryException - In the case query statement to be executed fails to be completed
